name: Go Tortoise - A Multiplayer Race Game of Fun and Run between 2 old rivals
name_original: Go Tortoise - A Multiplayer Race Game of Fun and Run between 2 old rivals
description:
Old Race, but a completely New way to Play !!
Come on ! Join us in the race of the century between 2 old rivals - The Tortoise and The Rabbit
You will soon get addicted to these controls - tap and hold the right button and then tap and hold the left ,then try to make them meet at the highest number. Sounds simple ! Lets See whether you can beat your friends or not !
